name: Additional Development,附加开发
description: Additional development headers and libraries for building open-source applications.,用于构建开源应用程序的附加开发标头及程序可。

name: Backup Client,备份客户端

name: Backup Server,备份服务器
description: Software to centralize your infrastructure's backups.,集中管理基础设施备份的软件。

name: Base,基本
description: The basic installation of CentOS Linux.,CentOS Linux 基本安装。

name: CentOS Linux Client product core,CentOS Linux Client 产品核心
description: Packages mandatory for the client product.,客户端产品必需的软件包。

name: Compatibility Libraries,兼容性程序库
description: Compatibility libraries for applications built on previous versions of CentOS Linux.,用于在 CentOS Linux 的之前版本中构建的应用程序的兼容程序库。

name: CentOS Linux ComputeNode product core,CentOS Linux ComputeNode 产品核心
description: Packages mandatory for the computenode product.,computenode 产品必需的软件包。

name: Conflicts (Client),冲突（客户端）
description: This group includes packages conflicting with @everything installation on the Client variant.,这个组群包含与 @everything 客户端变体安装冲突的软件包。

name: Conflicts (ComputeNode),冲突（计算节点）
description: This group includes packages conflicting with @everything installation on the ComputeNode variant.,这个组群包含与 @everything 计算节点变体安装冲突的软件包。

name: Conflicts (Server),冲突（服务器）
description: This group includes packages conflicting with @everything installation on the Server variant.,这个组群包含与 @everything 服务器变体安装冲突的软件包。

name: Conflicts (Workstation),冲突（工作站）
description: This group includes packages conflicting with @everything installation on the Workstation variant.,这个组群包含与 @everything 工作站变体安装冲突的软件包。

name: Console Internet Tools,控制台互联网工具
description: Console internet access tools, often used by administrators.,控制台互联网访问工具，通常由管理员使用。

name: Core,核心
description: Smallest possible installation.,最小可能安装。

name: Debugging Tools,调试工具
description: Tools for debugging misbehaving applications and diagnosing performance problems.,调试行为异常程序以及诊断性能问题的工具。

name: Desktop Debugging and Performance Tools,桌面调试和运行工具
description: GUI tools for debugging applications and performance.,调试应用程序和性能的 GUI 工具。

name: Development Tools,开发工具
description: A basic development environment.,基本开发环境。

name: Dial-up Networking Support,拨号网络支持
description: Tools for connecting via WWAN, PPP or ISDN.,通过 WWAN、PPP 或者 ISDN 连接的工具。

name: Directory Client,目录客户端
description: Clients for integration into a network managed by a directory service.,用于整合到使用目录服务管理的网络的客户端。

name: Directory Server,目录服务器
description: Machine and user identity servers.,机器和用户识别服务器。

name: DNS Name Server,DNS 名称服务器
description: This package group allows you to run a DNS name server (BIND) on the system.,该软件包组允许您在系统上运行 DNS 名称服务器(BIND)。

name: Emacs,Emacs
description: The GNU Emacs extensible, customizable, text editor.,GNU Emacs 可扩展、可自定义的文本编辑器。

name: File and Storage Server,文件及存储服务器
description: CIFS, SMB, NFS, iSCSI, iSER, and iSNS network storage server.,CIFS, SMB, NFS, iSCSI, iSER 及 iSNS 网络存储服务器。

name: Fonts,字体
description: Fonts for rendering text in a variety of languages and scripts.,在各种语言和脚本中输入文本的字体。

name: FTP Server,FTP 服务器
description: Allows the system to act as an FTP server.,允许将系统作为 FTP 服务器使用。

name: GNOME Applications,GNOME 应用程序
description: A set of commonly used GNOME Applications.,一组经常使用的 GNOME 应用程序。

name: GNOME,GNOME
description: GNOME is a highly intuitive and user friendly desktop environment.,GNOME 是一个非常直观且用户友好的桌面环境。

name: Graphical Administration Tools,图形管理工具
description: Graphical system administration tools for managing many aspects of a system.,用于管理系统各个方面的图形系统管理工具。

name: Graphics Creation Tools,图形生成工具
description: Software for creation and manipulation of still images.,生成和操作静止图像的软件。

name: Guest Agents,虚拟机代理
description: Agents used when running under a hypervisor.,在 hypervisor 中运行时使用的代理。

name: Guest Desktop Agents,虚拟机桌面代理
description: Agents used when running as a virtualized desktop.,作为虚拟桌面运行时使用的代理。

name: High Availability,高可用性
description: Infrastructure for highly available services and/or shared storage.,用于高度可用服务和（或者）共享存储的基础设施。

name: Hardware Monitoring Utilities,硬件监控工具

name: Identity Management Server,身份管理服务器
description: Centralized management of users, servers and authentication policies.,用户、服务器和认证策略的集中管理。

name: Infiniband Support,Infiniband 支持
description: Software designed for supporting clustering and grid connectivity using RDMA-based InfiniBand and iWARP fabrics.,用来支持集群和使用 RDMA InfiniBand 和 iWARO 光纤的网状连接性的软件。

name: Input Methods,输入法
description: Software for the input of international text.,输入国际文本的软件。

name: Internet Applications,互联网应用程序
description: Email, chat, and video conferencing software.,电子邮件、聊天和视频会议软件。

description: Firefox web browser.,Firefox 网页浏览器。

name: Java Platform,Java 平台
description: Java support for the CentOS Linux Server and Desktop Platforms.,CentOS Linux 服务器和桌面平台的 Java 支持。

name: KDE Applications,KDE 应用程序
description: A set of commonly used KDE Applications.,一组经常使用的 KDE 应用程序。

name: KDE,KDE
description: The KDE Plasma Workspaces, a highly-configurable graphical user interface which includes a panel, desktop, system icons and desktop widgets, and many powerful KDE applications.,KDE Plasma Workspaces 是一个高度可配置图形用户界面，其中包括面板、桌面、系统图标以及桌面向导和很多功能强大的 KDE 应用程序。

name: KDE Multimedia Support,KDE 多媒体支持
description: Multimedia support for KDE.,对 KDE 的多媒体支持。

description: Performance support tools for large systems.,用于大型系统的性能支持工具。

name: Legacy UNIX Compatibility,传统 UNIX 兼容性
description: Compatibility programs for migration from or working with legacy UNIX environments.,用于从继承 UNIX 环境中迁移或者可用于该环境的兼容程序。

name: Legacy X Window System Compatibility,传统 X Windows 系统的兼容性
description: Compatibility programs for migration from or working with legacy X Window System environments.,用于从继承 X Windows 环境中迁移或者可用于该环境的兼容程序。

name: Load Balancer,负载平衡器

name: E-mail Server,电子邮件服务器

name: Mainframe Access,主框架访问
description: Tools for accessing mainframe computing resources.,访问主框架计算源的工具。

description: Audio/video framework common to desktops.,桌面通用的音频/视频框架。

name: Network File System Client,网络文件系统客户端

name: Networking Tools,联网工具
description: Tools for configuring and analyzing computer networks.,配置和分析计算机网络的工具。

name: Common NetworkManager submodules,常用 NetworkManager 子模块

name: Office Suite and Productivity,办公套件和生产率
description: A full-purpose office suite, and other productivity tools.,全套办公套件以及其它产品工具。

name: Performance Tools,性能工具
description: Tools for diagnosing system and application-level performance problems.,诊断系统和程序级别性能问题的工具。

name: Perl Support,Perl 支持
description: Perl interfaces to common libraries and functionality.,通用程序库和功能性的 Perl 界面。

name: Perl for Web,网页用 Perl
description: Basic Perl web application support.,基本 Perl 网页应用程序支持。

name: PHP Support,PHP 支持
description: PHP web application framework.,PHP web 应用程序框架。

name: Platform Development,平台开发

description: Virtualization utilities and drivers for VMware,VMware 虚拟化工具和驱动

description: The PostgreSQL SQL database client, and associated packages.,PostgreSQL SQL 数据库客户端以及相关软件包。

name: Print Server,打印服务器

name: Python,Python

name: Remote Desktop Clients,远程桌面客户端
Remote Management for Linux,Linux 的远程管理
description: Remote management interface for CentOS Linux, including OpenLMI and SNMP.,CentOS Linux 的远程管理界面，其中包含 OpenLMI 和 SNMP。

name: Resilient Storage,弹性存储

name: Ruby Support,Ruby 支持
description: Ruby interfaces to common libraries and functionality.,常用库和功能的 Ruby 界面。

name: Scientific Support,科学记数法支持

description: Packages mandatory for the server product.,服务器产品必需的软件包

name: Smart Card Support,智能卡支持

name: System Management,系统管理

name: Technical Writing,科技写作
description: Tools for writing technical documentation.,编写科技文档的工具。

name: Virtualization Client,虚拟化客户端
description: Clients for installing and managing virtualization instances.,用于安装和管理虚拟化事件的客户端。
